document_data.name: Sign of the Melancholy Dwarf
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sign of the Melancholy Dwarf''' was an expensive inn in [[the North]] around the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/20/The Ship of Night|7}}<ref group="note" name="location">This inn was not given a specific location in the "[[Dungeon magazine 20/The Ship of Night|The Ship of Night]]". Rather, the adventure stated that it could potentially be in [[Neverwinter]], [[Silverymoon]], or [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Services: This inn served a variety of food. Including [[potato]]s, [[yam]]s, various sweetmeats, and [[wine]]s.
document_data.Interior: In the back of the Melancholy Dwarf were privacy booths with curtains.
document_data.History: At some point a respected [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[sage]], [[Birgit|Birgit of the Iron House]], invited a group of [[adventurer]]s to meet her at this inn in order to discuss hiring them for a quest.
